ygData.subject: Re: Is the verdict finally in?
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a way around no drop items if you go to arena and duel and kill someone you can then loot their corpse. I know peeps who have sold there J-man boots
ygData.messageBody:
There is a way around no drop items if you go to arena and duel and kill
someone you can then loot their corpse. I know peeps who have sold there
J-man boots using this method.

T.C.
----- Original Message -----
From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 3:04 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Is the verdict finally in?


> From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>
> >From: "Trevalien Manix" <trevalien@...>
> >
> >Getting thse things would be a result of hacking not twinking. the thorny
> >vine armor is plane of fear and i think no drop. the pegasus claok is no
> >drop too.
> >
> >Trevalien
> >
>
> I'm talking overall - and yes, all those items are no drop. What I mean is
> that I see way too many 1st lvl characters wearing all bronze and in a few
> cases - steel chestplates!!!!!!!! Now if that isn't twinking - just shoot
> me! It took me a month solid of 2 hrs plus a night of saving to get my
steel
> chestplate! I'm just now crawling out of the hole I put myself into to get
> it. It practically cost an arm and a leg <checks himself to make sure he's
> not missing vital organs/body parts>
>
>
